src:
Rapat Perdana dengan Komisi IV DPR, Edhy Prabowo Salah Duduk
06 Nov 2019, 08:29 by Danang Sugianto


Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan Edhy Prabowo/Foto: Danang Sugianto

Jakarta - Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan Edhy Prabowo hari ini memenuhi undangan rapat kerja dengan mitranya di DPR RI, yaitu Komisi IV. Rapat kali ini selain perkenalan juga membahas rencana kerja Kementerian Kelautan dan Perikanan (KKP).Edhy sendiri terlihat masuk ke dalam ruangan Komisi IV sekitar pukul 15.00 WIB. Ada kejadian yang membuat satu ruangan tertawa.Saat masuk ke ruangan, Edhy yang mengenakan seragam KKP berwarna biru tiba-tiba duduk di kursi pimpinan Komisi IV DPR RI. "Eh salah ya," kelakarnya di Gedung DPR, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Setelah itu dia menyalami satu-satu anggota Komisi IV DPR RI. Dia terlihat akrab dengan anggota komisi lantaran sebelumnya Edhy merupakan ketua di sana. Saat membuka rapat, Ketua Komisi IV DPR RI Sudin mengucapkan selamat kepada Edhy lantaran telah dipercaya menjadi Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan."Harapan saya periode 2024 sampai 2029 nanti naik pangkat jadi Menko," tuturnya.Sebelum meminta Edhy untuk menjelaskan secara rinci rencana jangka pendek dan jangka panjang di Kementerian Kelautan dan Perikanan (KKP), para anggota Komisi IV DPR RI masing-masing memperkenalkan diri.Simak Video "Menteri KKP Blusukan Perdana ke Muara Angke"[Gambas:Video 20detik](das/ara)
text:
First Meeting with DPR Commission IV, Edhy Prabowo Salah Sits
Nov 6 2019, 08:29 by Danang Sugianto


Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Edhy Prabowo / Photo: Danang Sugianto

Jakarta - Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Edhy Prabowo today fulfilled an invitation to a working meeting with his partner in the Indonesian Parliament, namely Commission IV. This meeting besides introducing also discussed the work plan of the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP). Edhy himself was seen entering the room of Commission IV at around 3:00 pm West Indonesia Time. There was an incident that made one room laugh. When he entered the room, Edhy who was wearing a blue KKP uniform suddenly sat in the chair of the Commission IV DPR RI leader. "Err is wrong," he joked at the Parliament Building, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). After that he greeted the one and only member of the House of Representatives Commission IV. He looks familiar with the commission members because previously Edhy was the chairman there. When opening the meeting, Chairman of the House of Representatives Commission IV Sudin congratulated Edhy because he had been trusted to be the Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries. "My hope for the period of 2024 to 2029 will be promoted to be Coordinating Minister," he said. Before asking Edhy to explain in detail the short-term plan and in the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP), members of the House of Representatives Commission IV each introduce themselves. Watch Video "KKP Minister Blusukan Perdana to Muara Angke" [Gambas: Video 20second] (das / ara)
